title: Ep 176: The Many Sides of Australian Shiraz with Simone Madden-Grey
description: Simone Madden-Grey, our Down Under co-host, talks about the flavors of Shiraz & how it can't be pigeon-holed into one profile or type of wine. A refreshing look at Australia from an inside view, you'll want to run out to producers she mentions!
